Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, CODSUBES, CORRECAO, QTCOSSEG, TIPAPO, FONTE, CHAR(DTINIVIG,LOCAL), CHAR(DTTERVIG,LOCAL), COD_MOEDA_IMP, ORGAO FROM seguros.v1endosso WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND TIPO_ENDOSSO < '2' AND DTINIVIG <= :DTINIVIG AND DTTERVIG >= :DTINIVIG ORDER BY 1,8 DESC END SQL
